segments.text: David , what's new with you ? You are not in the mood . Can you tell me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: After six months , my college life will come to the end . The following trouble will be the job-hunting . That's really a headache .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do not take things so seriously , my pal ! Every one of us will face the trouble and job-hunting is inevitable . Take it easy ! Believe in yourself and some day you will be successful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sounds reasonable . Maybe I should look on the bright side .
segments.speaker: S2
